contentrichtext.text: {{infobox china station |icon = [[File:BJS Line 13 icon.svg|50px]][[File:BJS Changping Line icon.svg|50px]] |namerom = Xi'erqi |name = 西二旗 |image = Xi'erqi station 20130131.jpg |imagesize = |caption = The new Xi'erqi station. |prov = Beijing |city = Beijing |district = |districtname = |open = September 22, 2002 (old station)<br>December 25, 2010 (new station) |close = December 25, 2010 (old station) |oldname = |presentname = |station_number = |operator = Beijing Mass Transit Railway Operation Corp., Ltd |line = {{BJS line links|13}}{{BJS line links|CP}} |stats = |statsnote = |coordinates = |services = {{s-rail|title=BJS}} {{s-line|system=BJS|line=13|previous=Shangdi|next=Longze}} {{s-line|system=BJS|line=Changping|previous=|next=Life Science Park}} }} '''Xi'erqi''' is an interchange [[metro station|station]] between [[Line 13, Beijing Subway|Line 13]] and the [[Changping Line, Beijing Subway|Changping Line]] on the [[Beijing Subway]] in China.<ref>{{cite web|title=西二旗|url=http://www.beijing.cn/rcpage/ditie/page/100415.shtml|language=Chinese|publisher=Beijing Municipal Government|accessdate=1 February 2012}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|title=地铁昌平线--西二旗|url=http://www.beijing.cn/rcpage/ditie/page/100738.shtml|language=Chinese|publisher=Beijing Municipal Government|accessdate=1 February 2012}}</ref> The station has relocated to a new location several hundreds meters north on 25 December 2010 to ease transfer between the two lines when the new Changping Line opened, and the original station is now defunct. <gallery> File:Xierqi station passageway 20130131.JPG|The new station. File:New Xierqi station.jpg|The new station (line 13). The platform of the Changping Line is visible in the top left corner.
